title: When do the missions reset?
body: I noticed that the missions have 10 days before they expire. Is that when the next missions roll out? Or are they added every 7 days?

replies.body: I believe there's a little overlap to let people have a bit longer to complete the first set of missions. AFAIK the new missions will come out on the same day the first set did.
All right, good to know. Thanks!
